document.full_text: intel corp  raised its dividend by 16 percent for the third quarter, its second increase in six months, as the world's largest chipmaker expects robust demand for computers in 2011, sending its shares up 2 percent.
document.title: intel raises dividend 16 percent, shares rise
lines_and_colors: intel corp  raised its dividend by 16 percent for the third quarter, its second increase in six months, as the world's largest chipmaker expects robust demand for computers in 2011, sending its shares up 2 percent.
